DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study perform linguistic validation french version PISQ-R questionnaire population sexually active ( ) patient undergone surgery ( ) stress urinary incontinence genital prolapse .
DOC.detailed_description: Step 1 : Establish French translation original questionnaire ( English > French . Step 2 : Perform first set comprehension test panel 15 patient . Step 3 : Establish revise questionnaire . Step 4 : Perform second series comprehension test panel 10 patient . Step 5 : Determine final questionnaire . Step 6 : Perform back-translation ( French > English . Step 7 : Send final version questionnaire questionnaire back-translated specific committee IUGA final approval .
DOC.criteria: The patient able read understand French The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan Patients suffer pelvic organ prolapse and/or urinary incontinence and/or fecal incontinence . Patient pregnant The patient judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The patient understand French
